text: Jevha allahane phamarvile, ‘‘he isa! Mi tumhala purnatah ghenara ahe ani tumhala apalyakade ucaluna ghenara ahe ani tumhala inkari lokampasuna mukta rakhanara ahe ani kayamatacya divasaparyanta tumacya anuyayinna inkari lokanvara sresthatama rakhanara ahe.’’ Maga tumhi sarvanna majhyakadeca paratavayace ahe, mica tumacya daramyana samasta matabhedanca phaisala karina
